content: in this legal case the court has made a final ruling regarding the division of an estate the legitimate heirs of two individuals identified as sp gi and sp lu are entitled to a reserved share of the estate the court has ordered the dissolution of the existing community property and the allocation of assets to the parties involved each party has been assigned their entitled share and certain assets are to be restituted additionally the court has ordered the payment of a share of the lease of a farm to the petitioner and a share of the farms proceeds to sp gi the court has addressed objections raised by other parties and declared them inadmissible the division of the estate and allocation of assets have been determined based on the values assigned to each heir the court has concluded that the farm should be divided into three lots and may be sold if necessary the court has also discussed the calculation of costs and fees the case involves the death of st ad the mother of the petitioner and a dispute between the three children regarding the division of the estate the court has considered testamentary provisions and ordered the appointment of a technical expert to assess the value of assets and propose a division plan as the parties failed to reach an amicable settlement the court has decided on the division of assets the court has addressed the issue of indivisible property and the possibility of selling it if needed the judgment is considered final and the parties are responsible for paying the costs of the proceedings the ruling was made on september 17 2021 and filed in the clerks office on the same day
